info.title: To create a file in the &CAWS; console

step.para: Navigate to the project where you want to create a file. For more information about how to navigate to a repository, see
In the side navigation menu, choose Code, and then choose Repositories.
Choose the repository where you want to create the file, and then choose Create file.

Add the contents of the file in the editor. In Commit information, type the name of the file in File name. In Commit title, type a brief but informative description of why you made this change. This will be displayed as the basic commit information for the commit that adds the file to the source repository. Optionally add more information about the change in Description. When you are satisfied with your changes, choose Commit file.
